title: Technical Support Specialist
description: Provide first-line support for end-users, including troubleshooting hardware and software issues, ticket management, and escalating complex problems to the IT team. Tasks range from password resets and application installations to basic network connectivity checks.

title: Systems Support Lead
description: Lead support tasks for critical systems, overseeing routine maintenance, user account provisioning, and coordinating with vendors for escalations. Responsibilities include monitoring system performance, applying patches, and ensuring service continuity.

title: Support Engineer
description: Maintain and monitor server and network infrastructure, respond to incidents, execute backup and recovery procedures, and assist with automation scripts. Collaborate with development and operations to optimize system reliability.

title: Technical Support Technician
description: Deliver remote troubleshooting assistance for software and network issues, manage support tickets, perform user training on standard tools, and maintain documentation of known issues and resolutions.

title: IT Helpdesk Analyst
description: Serve as the primary contact for technical support requests via phone, email, and chat, resolve hardware and software queries, escalate unresolved incidents to senior support staff, and assist with password resets and network access troubleshooting.

title: Infrastructure Support Coordinator
description: Coordinate infrastructure support activities including monitoring network devices, assisting with system deployments, logging incident reports, and supporting senior administrators with patch management.

title: Systems Support Analyst
description: Analyze and troubleshoot system alerts, assist in configuring servers, manage user permissions, and collaborate with the IT team to implement basic automation for routine maintenance tasks.

title: Client Support Engineer
description: Provide remote client support for desktop and server environments, diagnose connectivity issues, install and configure applications, and coordinate with third-party support for escalations.

title: IT Operations Specialist
description: Assist with daily IT operations including monitoring system health, performing backups, executing scheduled maintenance windows, and supporting incident response under guidance of senior administrators.

title: Technical Operations Coordinator
description: Coordinate technical operations tasks such as account provisioning, system checks, hardware inventory management, and assist in server health monitoring and log analysis.

title: Support Services Engineer
description: Implement and troubleshoot support services, including remote desktop protocols, network connectivity tests, basic script execution for automation, and collaborate with operations team for escalations.

title: User Support Specialist
description: Deliver end-user support for hardware, software, and network requests, guide users through troubleshooting steps, manage helpdesk ticket lifecycle, and update support documentation.

title: Systems Technician
description: Perform system and network administration tasks such as user account management, patch application, log monitoring, and assist in configuring virtualization hosts.
